meta.title: About | Denton Design
meta.description: I started as a designer and worked my way up the creative ladder. I pride myself on leading by example. I don’t ask anyone on the team to do anything I haven’t done in the past.

approach.label: Approach
approach.content:
I started as a designer and worked my way up the creative ladder. I pride myself on leading by example. I don’t ask anyone on the team to do anything I haven’t done in the past. that has helped me forge strong bonds over the years 

the design tenets I have carried with me along the way include:

## Less is lovely

## Details are delightful

## research is required

## collaboration is crucial

## in-person, please

these ingredients generate an environment where wonderful things can grow.

contact.caption: I'd love to tell you more!

brownEvent.title: Happy birthday to me!
brownEvent.content: born, Learned to crawl, walked, said my first word, attended first day of school, made a best friend, drew every day, got in trouble for drawing every day, got an “A”, saw “E.T.” (cried), heard Beastie Boys “Licenced to Ill” (danced), turned into a teen, felt insecure, got hit by a car, started my amateur rap career, fell in love, got a broken heart, saw niagra falls, took my drivers test, drove a car, wrecked a car, won some art awards, graduated high school, left my humble home

events.title: purdue university
events.content:
Bachelors degree - computer graphics

associates degree - organizational leadership

events.title: one north interactive
events.content: partner, managing director of creative services
